refnamediv.refpurpose: Functions for embedding the progress bar into a plug-in's GUI.

refsynopsisdiv.title: Synopsis

refsect1.title: Description
refsect1.para: Functions for embedding the progress bar into a plug-in's GUI.

refsect2.title: GimpProgressVtable
gimp_progress_init ()
refsect2.para: Initializes the progress bar for the current plug-in.
Initializes the progress bar for the current plug-in. It is only valid to call this procedure from a plug-in.

listitem.simpara: Message to use in the progress dialog.
TRUE on success.

refsect2.title: gimp_progress_init_printf ()
refsect2.para: Initializes the progress bar for the current plug-in.
Initializes the progress bar for the current plug-in. It is only valid to call this procedure from a plug-in.

listitem.simpara: a standard printf() format string
arguments for format
TRUE on success.

refsect2.para: Since GIMP 2.4

refsect2.title: gimp_progress_update ()
refsect2.para: Updates the progress bar for the current plug-in.

listitem.simpara: Percentage of progress completed (in the range from 0.0 to 1.0).
TRUE on success.

refsect2.title: gimp_progress_pulse ()
refsect2.para: Pulses the progress bar for the current plug-in.

Updates the progress bar for the current plug-in. It is only valid to call this procedure from a plug-in. Use this function instead of gimp_progress_update() if you cannot tell how much progress has been made. This usually causes the the progress bar to enter \"activity mode\", where a block bounces back and forth.

listitem.simpara: TRUE on success.

refsect2.para: Since GIMP 2.4

refsect2.title: gimp_progress_set_text ()
refsect2.para: Changes the text in the progress bar for the current plug-in.
This function allows to change the text in the progress bar for the current plug-in. Unlike gimp_progress_init() it does not change the displayed value.

listitem.simpara: Message to use in the progress dialog.
TRUE on success.

refsect2.para: Since GIMP 2.4

refsect2.title: gimp_progress_set_text_printf ()
refsect2.para: Changes the text in the progress bar for the current plug-in.
This function allows to change the text in the progress bar for the current plug-in. Unlike gimp_progress_init() it does not change the displayed value.

listitem.simpara: a standard printf() format string
arguments for format
TRUE on success.

refsect2.para: Since GIMP 2.4

refsect2.title: gimp_progress_end ()
refsect2.para: Ends the progress bar for the current plug-in.
Ends the progress display for the current plug-in. Most plug-ins don't need to call this, they just exit when the work is done. It is only valid to call this procedure from a plug-in.

listitem.simpara: TRUE on success.

refsect2.para: Since GIMP 2.4

refsect2.title: gimp_progress_get_window_handle ()
refsect2.para: Returns the native window ID of the toplevel window this plug-in's progress is displayed in.
This function returns the native window ID of the toplevel window this plug-in\'s progress is displayed in.

listitem.simpara: The progress bar's toplevel window.

refsect2.para: Since GIMP 2.2
